UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: LcCCL28-25, Derived from Piscine Chemokine, Exhibits Antimicrobial Activity against Gram-Negative and Gram-Positive Bacteria In Vitro and In Vivo
Literature.Author: Su J, Li H, Hu J, Wang D, Zhang F, Fu Z, Han F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae CMCC 46117(MIC=>50.0µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(MIC=>50.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 13813(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=25.0µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=25.0µg/ml)
